system.description:
Benefit

When making an unarmed attack, the character receives a +1 bonus on attack rolls, and the character deals non-lethal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d6+POW modifier Normal Unarmed attacks normally deal non-lethal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d3+POW modifier

Special

Characters with natural melee weapons can use this feat to increase their natural melee weaponâ€™s damage by one damage dice, but that damage becomes non-lethal, unless modified by another feat.
